# BNNS.NormalizationType

**Enumeration**

Constants that describe normalization types.

## Declaration

```swift
enum NormalizationType
```

## Normalization Types

- **BNNS.NormalizationType.batch(movingMean:movingVariance:)**: Batch normalization with optional moving averages.
- **BNNS.NormalizationType.group(groupCount:)**: Group normalization.
- **BNNS.NormalizationType.instance(movingMean:movingVariance:)**: Instance normalization with optional moving averages.
- **BNNS.NormalizationType.layer(normalizationAxis:)**: Layer normalization.

items.description: Batch normalization with optional moving averages.
items.name: BNNS.NormalizationType.batch(movingMean:movingVariance:)
